com.psddev.dari.db
Class SolrDatabase

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.db.AbstractDatabase<org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer>
      com.psddev.dari.db.SolrDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database, SettingsBackedObject
public class SolrDatabase
extends AbstractDatabase<org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer>

Database backed by a Apache Solr server.

openConnection

public org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer openConnection()
Description copied from class: AbstractDatabase
Opens an implementation-specific connection to the underlying database. Once opened, the connection should be closed with AbstractDatabase.closeConnection(C).

Specified by:
openConnection in class AbstractDatabase<org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer>
Returns:
Can't be null.

doOpenReadConnection

protected org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer doOpenReadConnection()
Description copied from class: AbstractDatabase
Called when this database needs to open an implementation-specific connection to the underlying database that can only be used for reading data. The default implementation calls AbstractDatabase.openConnection().

Overrides:
doOpenReadConnection in class AbstractDatabase<org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServer>
Returns:
Can't be null.
